title: Requirements: adapter-output-qos-scheduler
five_acts: Act I - QoS Contract: introduced adapter-aware policy interfaces so output pacing behavior is explicit per transport.
Act II - Scheduler Core: added coalescing, fairness, and dynamic cadence control to reduce flood-control churn under concurrency.
Act III - Adapter Wiring: integrated QoS into Telegram, Discord, and WhatsApp output paths while preserving final-message correctness.
Act IV - Operational Guardrails: added PTB limiter wiring plus queue/cadence/retry observability for runtime diagnosis.
Act V - Validation Gauntlet: landed with full build/review loops, targeted regressions fixed, and demo blocks ready for post-merge execution.
